issue.title: Perimeter in the basket is not kept when an order is saved
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

When I make an order and I save it. If I re-open it, the perimeter is not shown and the map is not well displaid.

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.7

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

proj4js 1.1.0 didn't take into account EPSG:3857 (it was called EPSG:3875)...
